DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effect of the addition of idelalisib to bendamustine and rituximab on minimal residual disease (MRD) and evaluate the progression-free survival (PFS) in participants with previously untreated chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL).
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Idelalisib in Combination With Bendamustine and Rituximab in Subjects With Previously Untreated Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
